Tweet:
羽田→出雲着→石見銀山→移動＆宿泊→鳥取観光→鳥取発→羽田
が理想だけど
出雲空港がJALのみ、鳥取空港がANAのみで会社が違うからパックツアーは使えないのよね

パック使うなら、中間の米子空港を発着にして左右に大きく移動になるが
それぞれの往復考えたら、、ねぇ
English:
Haneda -> Izumo -> Iwami Ginzan -> Transportation & Accommodation -> Tottori sightseeing -> Departure from Tottori -> Haneda
is the ideal
Izumo Airport is JAL only, Tottori Airport is ANA only, and the companies are different, so you can't use a package tour.

If you use a pack, you will have to move left and right with departure and arrival at Yonago Airport in the middle.
If you think about each round trip, hey

1208着、1257発になったので
往復のいずれかをスーパーはくとなどにして1泊すれば
鳥取観光に組み合わせやすくなりました

ただ、気になるのは・・・

続
English:
Also, I'm really happy
Is it a review of the operating section of the Limited Express Hamakaze?

Until now, the setting of trains departing from and arriving at Tottori
2231 arrivals, 600 departures
1208 arrivals, 1257 departures
If you use either round trip as a supermarket and stay overnight
Easy to combine with sightseeing in Tottori

The only thing I'm worried about is...

Sequel

English:
Tottori Sand Dunes Sand Museum.
The world travel Egypt edition in the sand is being held until January 3rd!
I felt like I traveled to Egypt in Japan.
Tickets can be purchased for 200 yen at the tourist information center at Tottori Station. ^_^

Tweet:
昔インフルなのに病院の廊下走ったことあるし(走るな)、40度の熱に気付かず鳥取観光してたことあるし、まぁ私ならちょっと苦しむ程度で済むやろ😊と思ってたんだけど、私でこれなら他の人だったら死んでたな
私でよかった
English:
A long time ago, I ran in the corridor of a hospital when I had the flu (don't run), and I went sightseeing in Tottori without noticing a fever of 40 degrees. If it was someone else, I would have died.
I'm glad it was me

Tweet: おはようございます。雨。寒い朝ですね。鳥取県のウォーフォールの作品が物議されてるけどこれだけニュースになればもう成功なんじゃないか。砂の美術館も見事だったし隣りの島根は足立美術館あるから鳥取観光として現代アートもありだと思うけど。
English: good morning. rain. It's a cold morning, isn't it? Tottori Prefecture's Warfall work is controversial, but if it's in the news this much, it's already a success. The Sand Museum was also wonderful, and the neighboring Shimane has the Adachi Museum of Art, so I think Tottori has contemporary art as well.

Tweet:
鳥取県はクルマ社会です。(朝は分からないけど)夕方〜夜の通勤時間帯も含めて人はまばらで少なくとも鳥取駅付近では人よりもクルマの方が多く感じました。
これにて本日の鳥取観光は終了です。皆様にリプで教えて頂いたところは大体回れたかと思います。充実した1日でした。ありがとうございました☺️ https://t.co/zzmMcmV2RR
English:
Tottori Prefecture is a car society. (I don't know in the morning) People are sparse, including the evening and night commuting hours, and at least near Tottori Station, I felt more cars than people.
This is the end of today's Tottori sightseeing. I think I was able to get around most of the things that everyone told me in their replies. It was a fulfilling day. Thank you ☺️ https://t.co/zzmMcmV2RR

中学の地理の学習で単語は覚えてたけど、実物を見るのは初めて。
平日だけど、人多い。
English:
The first sightseeing in Tottori is Uradome Coast, where you can see one of Japan's leading island hopping excursion boats, the Rias Coast.
I had memorized the words in my junior high school geography class, but this was my first time seeing the real thing.
Although it is a weekday, there are many people.
